events.name: The Magic Parlor
events.description: Join Rob from The Magic Parlor as he shows us around his shop in Salem, MA. Rob sits in the psychics reading room and tells us of spooky moments that made him feel a little superstitious.

events.name: Folk Devils: Moral Panics and New Religious Movements in the 20th Century
events.description: Join Grey Faction's Hadrian Flyte for a presentation on Folk Devils and their place in the social landscape of the 20th century.

events.name: How to Start A Cult
events.description: Join Ross Blocher (Oh No Ross and Carrie podcast) and learn how to fake having paranormal powers to gain a cult following.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: Ritual Healing: A screening and discussion of Alejandro Jodorowsky's Psychomagic: A Healing Art
events.description: This documentary and accompanying discussion explores the healing power of non-supernatural ritual magic

events.name: The Rabbit's Fall Harvest
events.description: Come peek to see who found some snacks in the kitchen! Hint: It's Winston and Winona

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy: Music and Videos
events.description: Join Mercy Maelica for music and videos live from Salem.

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
